text: I counsel yoʋ to buy from me gold refined by fire so that yoʋ may be rich, and white garments so that yoʋ may clothe yoʋrself and the shame of yoʋr nakedness may not be 3:18 revealed, and eye salve to anoint yoʋr eyes ¦ revealed; and yoʋ must anoint yoʋr eyes with eye salve BYZ PCK TRrevealed, and eye salve to anoint yoʋr eyes so that yoʋ may see.
